alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 1:57PM CDT until May 12 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR PHELPS...WESTERN KEARNEY...WESTERN BUFFALO AND EASTERN DAWSON COUNTIES... At 157 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eddyville to 6 miles south of Sumner to 8 miles south of Overton, moving north at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Eddyville around 200 PM CDT. Sumner around 205 PM CDT. Amherst and Miller around 215 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 235 and 276. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
